message.name: HTTP_400_FILE_ALREADY_LINKED_TO_PERSON
message.locale: The specified file is already linked to a person, and cannot be linked to a second object.

message.name: HTTP_400_FILE_ALREADY_LINKED_TO_CASE
message.locale: The specified file is already linked to a case, and cannot be linked to a second object.

message.name: HTTP_400_FILE_ALREADY_LINKED_TO_VERIFICATION_ITEM_PROVIDED
message.locale: The specified file is already linked to an accepted proof for a verification, and cannot be linked to a second object.

message.name: HTTP_400_FILE_ALREADY_LINKED_TO_ANOTHER_ENTITY
message.locale: The specified file is already linked to an object, and cannot be linked to a second object.
